TypeSignature.Value: public class LinkButton : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl, System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinkButton extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl
Public Class LinkButton Inherits WebControl Implements IButtonControl, IPostBackEventHandler
public ref class LinkButton : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl, System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler, System::Web::UI::WebControls::IButtonControl
type LinkButton = class inherit WebControl interface IButtonControl interface IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 在 Web 页上显示超链接样式按钮控件。

span.span: Displays a hyperlink-style button control on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [LinkButton 控件和验证LinkButton Controls and Validation](#ButtonControlsAndValidation) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件在网页上创建一个超链接样式按钮。Use the control to create a hyperlink-style button on the Web page. 控件具有相同的外观控件，但具有相同的功能控件。The control has the same appearance as a control, but has the same functionality as a control. 如果你想要单击控件时链接到另一个 Web 页面，请考虑使用控件。If you want to link to another Web page when the control is clicked, consider using the control. > [!NOTE] > 控件呈现到客户端浏览器 JavaScript。The control renders JavaScript to the client browser. 客户端浏览器必须为该控件启用 JavaScript 才能正常工作。The client browser must have JavaScript enabled for this control to function properly. 客户端脚本的详细信息，请参阅[客户端脚本在 ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa)。For more information on client script, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa). 您可以创建一个提交按钮或命令按钮。You can create either a Submit button or a Command button. 一个提交按钮没有与之关联的命令名称。A Submit button does not have a command name associated with it. 该按钮仅将 Web 页面回发到服务器。The button simply posts the Web page back to the server. 默认情况下，控件是一个提交按钮。By default, a control is a Submit button. 你可以提供的事件处理程序事件以编程方式控制的操作执行时单击提交按钮。You can provide an event handler for the event to programmatically control the actions performed when the Submit button is clicked. 但是，在命令按钮有与该按钮，如关联的命令名称`Sort`。On the other hand, a Command button has a command name associated with the button, such as `Sort`. 设置属性指定的命令名称。Set the property to specify the command name. 这使您可以创建多个在 Web 上的控件，并以编程方式确定哪些单击控件。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. 此外可以使用属性提供一个命令按钮，提供有关要执行，例如，指定按升序排列的命令的其他信息。You can also use the property with a Command button to provide additional information about the command to perform, such as specifying ascending order. 您还可以提供的事件处理程序单击命令按钮时执行的事件以编程方式控制操作。You can also provide an event handler for the event to programmatically control the action performed when the Command button is clicked. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 文本不是 HTML 编码在显示之前控件。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the control. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## LinkButton 控件和验证LinkButton Controls and Validation 默认情况下执行页验证时单击控件。By default, page validation is performed when a control is clicked. 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件关联。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 若要防止发生页验证，请设置属性设置为`false`。To prevent page validation from occurring, set the property to `false`. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples Visual Studio Web 站点项目的源代码是可随附于本主题：[下载](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192872)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192872). 下面的示例演示如何创建控件中显示的文本控制单击链接时。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that displays text in a control when the link is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法在自定义服务器控件，以便可以将文本属性设置为已分析的对象的 text 属性的已分析的对象是否对象，或为空否则为的字符串。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it either sets the text property to the parsed object's text property, if the parsed object is a object, or to an empty string otherwise. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_linkbutton_addparsedsubobjectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_linkbutton_addparsedsubobjectvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_linkbutton_addparsedsubobject.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_linkbutton_addparsedsubobject.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool CausesValidation { get; set; }
.property instance bool CausesValidation
Public Overridable Property CausesValidation As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CausesValidation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CausesValidation : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击 控件时是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 控件后执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下执行页验证时单击控件。By default, page validation is performed when a control is clicked. 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件关联。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 你可以指定 （或确定） 是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时通过单击控件属性。You can specify (or determine) whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when a control is clicked by using the property. 若要禁止从正在执行的验证，请设置属性设置为`false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 此属性通常设置为`false`重置或清除按钮，以防止在单击按钮时执行验证。This property is commonly set to `false` for a Reset or Clear button to prevent validation from being performed when the button is clicked. 时的值属性设置为`true`，还可以使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称控件引发验证。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以防止发生页验证。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 请注意如何方法单独激活每个验证的控件。Notice how the method activates each validation control independently. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButtonCausesValidation/CS/linkbuttoncausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButtonCausesValidation/VB/linkbuttoncausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

Public Custom Event Click As EventHandler

member this.Click : EventHandler

summary.span: 在单击 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时单击控件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 与关联没有命令名称时，通常使用此事件控制，例如一个提交按钮。This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the control, as in the case of a Submit button. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和编写代码的处理程序事件，以显示一条消息时单击控件。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display a message when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

.event class System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventHandler Command
Public Custom Event Command As CommandEventHandler
public: virtual event System::Web::UI::WebControls::CommandEventHandler ^ Command;
member this.Command : System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventHandler

summary.span: 在单击 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时单击控件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件时常用的命令名称，如`Sort`，与关联控件。This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the control. 这使您可以创建多个在 Web 上的控件，并以编程方式确定哪些单击控件。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 的控件层次结构中的窗体通过引发事件`BubbleEvent`。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和编写代码的处理程序事件，以显示一条消息时单击控件。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display a message when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与关联的 属性一起传递到 事件处理程序的可选参数。

span.span: Gets or sets an optional argument passed to the event handler along with the associated property.

value.span: 一个可选参数，与关联的 属性一起传递到 事件处理程序。

span.span: An optional argument passed to the event handler along with the associated property.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的参数进行了补充，属性。Use the property to specify an argument that complements the property. > [!NOTE] > 属性是通常只时使用属性设置。The property is typically only used when the property is set. 属性补充通过允许您提供有关要执行的命令的任何其他信息的属性。The property complements the property by allowing you to provide any additional information about the command to perform. 例如，可以设置属性设置为`Sort`并设置属性设置为`Ascending`以指定要按升序排序的命令。For example, you can set the property to `Sort` and set the property to `Ascending` to specify a command to sort in ascending order. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定一个可选参数，进行了补充的命令名称控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify an optional argument that complements the command name for a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

Public Property CommandName As String

member this.CommandName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与 控件关联的命令名。

span.span: Gets or sets the command name associated with the control.

summary.span: 此值与 属性一起传递到 事件处理程序。

span.span: This value is passed to the event handler along with the property.
The command name of the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当有多个控件在网页上，使用属性来指定或确定的命令名称关联单击的控件。When you have multiple controls on a Web page, use the property to specify or determine the command name associated with the control clicked. 可以设置与任何字符串，标识要执行的命令的属性。You can set the property with any string that identifies the command to perform. 然后，可以以编程方式确定的命令名称控制并执行相应操作。You can then programmatically determine the command name of the control and perform the appropriate actions. 其他信息，有关该命令，如`Ascending`排序顺序，可以通过使用指定属性。Additional information about the command, such as an `Ascending` sort order, can be specified by using the property. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定的命令名称控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a command name for a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions GetPostBackOptions ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions GetPostBackOptions() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function GetPostBackOptions () As PostBackOptions
protected: virtual System::Web::UI::PostBackOptions ^ GetPostBackOptions();
abstract member GetPostBackOptions : unit -> System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions override this.GetPostBackOptions : unit -> System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions

summary.span: 创建表示 控件的回发行为的 对象。

span.span: Creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior.

returns.span: 一个表示 控件的回发行为的 。

span.span: A that represents the control's postback behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建对象，表示控件的回发的行为。The method creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior. 对象通常然后传递给方法，用于获取的客户端脚本函数的引用，调用时，会导致服务器回发到页面。The object is then typically passed to the method, which is used to obtain a reference to a client-side script function that, when invoked, causes the server to post back to the page. 扩展时，使用此方法主要由控件开发人员类。This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the class.

para.span: 您可以重写修改 button 控件的回发选项，或单击该按钮时调用客户端脚本在派生类中的方法。

span.span: You can override the method in your derived class to modify the postback options for the button control, or to call client-side script when the button is clicked.

para.span: 请务必调用基类的方法，以便回发的标准选项设置。

span.span: Be sure to call the base class's method so that the standard postback options are set.

related.span: 按钮 Web 服务器控件概述

related.span: 在 ASP.NET Web Pages 中的客户端脚本

span.span: Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnClick (EventArgs e);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnClick(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed

abstract member OnClick : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnClick : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 控件的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时单击控件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 与关联没有命令名称时，通常使用此事件控制，例如一个提交按钮。This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the control, as in the case of a Submit button. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和编写代码的处理程序事件，以显示其单击控件。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display which control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置在引发某个 控件的 事件时所执行的客户端脚本

span.span: Gets or sets the client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised

value.span: 在引发某个 控件的 事件时所执行的客户端脚本。

span.span: The client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定时，会执行的其他客户端侧脚本控件的引发事件。Use the property to specify additional client-side script that executes when the control's event is raised. 为此属性呈现在指定的脚本控件的`OnClick`属性除了控件的预定义的客户端脚本。The script that you specify for this property is rendered in the control's `OnClick` attribute in addition to the control's predefined client-side script. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定时，会执行的其他客户端侧脚本单击控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify additional client-side script that executes when a control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButton.OnClientClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.OnClientClick/CS/linkbutton.onclientclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButton.OnClientClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.OnClientClick/VB/linkbutton.onclientclickvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 控件的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时单击控件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件时常用的命令名称，如`Sort`，与关联控件。This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the control. 这使您可以创建多个在 Web 上的控件，并以编程方式确定哪些单击控件。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 的控件层次结构中的窗体通过引发事件`BubbleEvent`。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和编写代码的处理程序事件，以显示其单击控件。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display which control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知控件来执行必要的步骤预呈现之前将视图状态和呈现内容保存到客户端。The method notifies the control to perform any necessary prerendering steps prior to saving view state and rendering content to the client. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，以便在自定义永远不会显示一个边框控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that a border is never displayed in a custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_linkbutton_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_linkbutton_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_linkbutton_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_linkbutton_onprerender.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string PostBackUrl { get; set; }
.property instance string PostBackUrl
Public Overridable Property PostBackUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ PostBackUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.PostBackUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置单击 控件时从当前页发送到的网页的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

value.span: 单击 控件时从当前页发送到的网页的 URL。

span.span: The URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示将页回发到自身。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which causes the page to post back to itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够跨页后使用控件。The property allows you to perform a cross-page post using the control. 设置属性设置为 Web 页的 URL 时要发送到单击控件。Set the property to the URL of the Web page to post to when the control is clicked. 例如，指定 Page2.aspx 会导致包含的页控制要发布到`Page2.aspx`。For example, specifying Page2.aspx causes the page that contains the control to post to `Page2.aspx`. 如果未指定的值属性，页面回发到自身。If you do not specify a value for the property, the page posts back to itself. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在执行与服务器端验证的控件跨页回发时，应检查的页属性是`true`之前处理回发。When performing a cross-page postback with controls with server-side validation, you should check that the page's property is `true` before processing the postback. 对于跨页回发时，要检查的页面是 PreviousPage。In the case of a cross-page postback, the page to check is the PreviousPage. 下面的 Visual Basic 代码演示如何做到这一点：The following Visual Basic code shows how this is done: ``` Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load If Page.PreviousPage.IsValid Then ' Handle the post back Else Response.Write("Invalid") End If End Sub ``` 有关跨页面张贴的技术的详细信息，请参阅[跨页面发送在 ASP.NET Web 窗体](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b)。For more information on cross-page posting techniques, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性执行跨页面发送。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to perform a cross-page post. 当用户单击控件，页面发到指定的目标页的文本框中输入的值属性。When the user clicks the control, the page posts the value entered in the text box to the target page specified by the property. 若要运行此示例，您还必须在此代码示例所在的同一目录中创建目标页的文件。To run this sample, you must also create a file for the target page in the same directory as this code example. 目标页的代码在下一步的示例中提供。The code for the target page is provided in the next example. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButton.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.PostBackUrlProperty/CS/linkbutton.postbackurlpropertycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButton.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.PostBackUrlProperty/VB/linkbutton.postbackurlpropertyvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来访问已发布的值从另一个页面使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access a value that was posted from another page using the property. 此页获取前一页从发布并为用户显示的字符串。This page gets the string that was posted from the previous page and displays it to the user. 如果尝试直接运行此代码示例，则将会出现错误，因为值`text`字段将为`null`。If you attempt to run this code example directly, you will get an error because the value of the `text` field will be `null`. 相反，使用此代码创建一个目标页面并将该文件放在与上一示例的代码相同的目录。Instead, use this code to create a target page and place the file in the same directory as the code for the previous example. 文件的名称必须对应于指定的值上一示例中的属性。The name of the file must correspond to the value specified for the property in the previous example. 对于上面的示例代码运行时，此页将在发生跨页面发送时自动执行。When you run the code for the previous example, this page will execute automatically when the cross-page post occurs. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButton.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.PostBackUrlPage2/CS/linkbutton.postbackurlpage2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButton.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.PostBackUrlPage2/VB/linkbutton.postbackurlpage2vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool SupportsDisabledAttribute { get; }

Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SupportsDisabledAttribute As Boolean

member this.SupportsDisabledAttribute : bool

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于4.0; 否则为。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示如何 ASP.NET 应呈现 HTML 控件的控件处于禁用状态时。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 会将`disabled`属性时控件处于禁用状态。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 会将`class`属性时控件处于禁用状态。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在 控件上的文本标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the text caption displayed on the control.

value.span: 显示在 控件上的文本标题。

span.span: The text caption displayed on the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定或确定要在显示的标题控件。Use the property to specify or determine the caption to display on the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定在显示的标题控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the caption that appears on the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 按钮 Web 服务器控件概述

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证组可以分配给特定类别的页面上的验证控件。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组可以独立于其他页上的验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用属性指定的验证组的名称为其控件回发到服务器时导致验证。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 此属性才起作用时，才的值属性设置为`true`。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 指定的值时属性，只是指定组的一部分的验证控件的验证时控件回发到服务器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果不指定此属性的值和属性设置为`true`，页面上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件时该控件回发到服务器进行都验证。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要的控件时验证控件回发到服务器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls that are to be validated when a control posts back to the server. 页包含三个用于捕获用户数据的文本框和三个控制措施来确保用户未将一个文本框留空。The page contains three text boxes to capture data from the user and three controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 控制在前两个文本框中为`PersonalInfoGroup`验证组并控制第三个文本框处于`LocationInfoGroup`验证组。The controls for the first two text boxes are in the `PersonalInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the third text box is in the `LocationInfoGroup` validation group. 当`LinkButton1`单击时，仅验证组中的控件`PersonalInfoGroup`进行验证。When `LinkButton1` is clicked, only the controls in validation group `PersonalInfoGroup` are validated. 当`LinkButton2`单击时，仅验证组中的控件`LocationInfoGroup`进行验证。When `LinkButton2` is clicked, only the control in validation group `LocationInfoGroup` is validated. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButton.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.ValidationGroup/CS/linkbutton.validationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButton.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.ValidationGroup/VB/linkbutton.validationgroupvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Button Web Server Controls Overview
